channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Another pothole in our lane, 26th May
item.description:
What three words reference: lamps.silk.vocab Please note that we do not want the pot holes filled because they have been done so poorly in the past as the overfilling it has created more issues. This road has not been resurfaced for at least 30 years.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lowdilow Lane, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Drain is flooded on Granley Road, near Greville Court, 26th May
item.description:
The on the junction to Greville court and in front of a driveway is flooded. This issue has been present for several days. It has also happened many times in the past meaning it hasn’t been fixed or checked thoroughly.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Granley Road, Hatherley, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
